Container.Name: Jellyseer Request Automation
Container.Overview: Automatically request suggested movies and TV shows to Jellyseer based on recently watched.

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Where the container data will be stored

Config.Name: Jellyfin Application URL
Config.Description: The URL of your Jellyfin instance.

Config.Name: Jellyfin API Key
Config.Description: The API token for accessing Jellyfin.

Config.Name: Jellyseer Application URL
Config.Description: The URL of your Jellyseer instance.

Config.Name: Jellyseer API Key
Config.Description: The API token for accessing Jellyseer.

Config.Name: Maximum Amount of Similar Movies
Config.Description: The maximum number of similar movies to download. Default is 3, with a max limit of 20.

Config.Name: Maximum Amount of Similar Shows
Config.Description: The maximum number of similar TV shows to download. Default is 2, with a max limit of 20.
